00036 RequestHandler::RequestHandler()
00037 {
00038     reqTag = 0; 
00039     pipelineFilled = false;     
00040     oneBufferFull = false;      
00041     addrMap = new AddrMap();
00042     addrMap->parent = this;
00043     busHandler = new BusHandler();
00044     busHandler->parent = this;                          
00045     for(short i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00046     {
00047         chan[i].chanId = i;
00048         for(short j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00049         {
00050             chan[i].rank[j].rankId = j;
00051             for(short k=0; k<NO_OF_BANKS; k++)
00052             {   
00053                 chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].myChannel = i;
00054                 chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bankId = k;
00055                 chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].parent = this;
00056                 chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bufferId = (ullint)floor(k*NO_OF_BUFFERS/NO_OF_BANKS);  // TODO need to set based on number of buffers
00057                 chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].myRank = (void*)(&chan[i].rank[j]);
00058             }   
00059         }
00060     }
00061     lastBatchFormTime = 0;      
00062 }

00071 RequestHandler::~RequestHandler()
00072 {
00073     delete addrMap;

00077 void RequestHandler::SetLinks()
00078 {
00079     for(short i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00080     {
00081         busHandler->cmdIssuer[i].dataBus = &((Bus*)child)->dataBus[i];
00082         busHandler->cmdIssuer[i].cmdBus = &((Bus*)child)->cmdBus[i];    
00083     }
00084 }

00086 void RequestHandler::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00087 {
00088     Request *req = new Request();       
00089     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent(); 
00090     int temp = lastBatchFormTime+BATCH_FORM_TIME;
00091     switch (e->type)
00092     {
00093         case START:   
00094                 if ( temp > Simulator::Now() )
00095                     FormBatch();
00096                 *req = *((Request*)e->event_data.at(0));
00097                 PushPipeline(req);      
00098 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00099                 cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": Now I am in start of request handler\n"; 
00100 #endif
00101                 if (!oneBufferFull)     
00102                 {
00103                     event->src = (Component*)this;
00104                     event->dst = (Component*)addrMap;   
00105                     event->type = START;
00106                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &AddrMap::process_event, (AddrMap*)event->dst, event);
00107                 }
00108                 else 
00109                 {
00110                     pipelineFilled = true;      
00111                     delete event;
00112                 }
00113             delete req;                 
00114             break;              
00115 
00116         case STOP_CMD_QUEUE:
00117             for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00118             {   
00119                 busHandler->full[i] = true;
00120                 busHandler->stopSignal = true;  
00121             }   
00122             delete event;
00123             delete req; 
00124             break;
00125         
00126         case START_CMD_QUEUE:
00127             for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00128             {           
00129                 busHandler->full[i] = false;
00130                 busHandler->stopSignal = false; 
00131             }
00132             delete event;
00133             delete req;                 
00134             break;              
00135 
00136     case CONTINUE: 
00137             {
00138                 if (temp > Simulator::Now())
00139                     FormBatch();
00140                 oneBufferFull = false;
00141 /*                if( !((MC*)mc)->ni->ni_recv)
00142                 {
00143                     ((MC*)mc)->ni->ni_recv = true;
00144                     IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00145                     event2->src = (Component*)this;
00146                     event2->dst = (Component*)(((MC*)mc)->ni);  
00147                     event2->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00148                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NI::process_event, (NI*)event2->dst, event2);
00149                 }
00150                 else
00151                 {
00152                     IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00153                     event2->src = (Component*)this;
00154                     event2->dst = (Component*)this;     
00155                     event2->type = CONTINUE;
00156                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &RequestHandler::process_event, this, event2);
00157 
00158                 }
00159 
00160 */
00161                 if (pipelineFilled)     
00162                 {
00163 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00164                     cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << pipeline.address << ": NI Now I am in continue of request handler\n"; 
00165 #endif
00166                     pipelineFilled = false;
00167                     event->src = (Component*)this;
00168                     event->dst = (Component*)addrMap;   
00169                     event->type = START;
00170                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &AddrMap::process_event, (AddrMap*)event->dst, event);
00171                 }
00172                 else
00173                    delete event;
00174             delete req; 
00175             }
00176             break;
00177 
00178         default:
00179                  //cerr <<  "RequestHandler There should be no default case as such/n";
00180             break;
00181 
00182     }
00183     if (!e->event_data.empty())
00184         delete (Request*)e->event_data.at(0);           
00185     delete e;
00186 }

00188 void RequestHandler::PushPipeline(Request *req)
00189 {
00190     pipeline = *req;
00191 }

00198 void RequestHandler::FormBatch() 
00199 {
00200 #ifdef PARBS
00201 //      MarkAll();
00202 //#else
00203         MarkBatchOnly();
00204 #endif
00205    
00206     lastBatchFormTime += BATCH_FORM_TIME;       
00207 }

00209 void RequestHandler::MarkAll() 
00210 {
00211     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00212         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00213             for (unsigned int k=0; k<NO_OF_BUFFERS; k++)        
00214                 for (unsigned int l=0; l<chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k].size(); l++)
00215                         chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k][l].mark = true;
00216 }
00217 
00218 void RequestHandler::MarkBatchOnly()
00219 {
00220     unsigned int count[NO_OF_THREADS];  
00221     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00222         count[i]=0;
00223         
00224     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00225         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00226             for (unsigned int k=0; k<NO_OF_BUFFERS; k++)
00227                 if (chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k].size() > MAX_BATCH_SIZE)
00228                     for (unsigned int l=MAX_BATCH_SIZE; l<chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k].size(); l++)
00229                         chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k][l].mark = false;     
00230 }
